<P class="Ysubsection">(2) No recruiter, employer or prospective employer shall knowingly engage or use the services of a recruiter unless the recruiter holds a licence for that purpose as required under subsection (1). <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="97113-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2021-c-35/latest/so-2021-c-35.html">2021, c. 35</A>, Sched. 2, <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="9" href="#sec9_smooth">s. 9</A>.</P>
 

 
<P class="headnote">Application for licence</P>
 
<div class="paragWrapper" data-lbh-p-number="74.1.3" data-lbh-p-anchor="sec74.1.3" data-lbh-p-noteup-link="/en/#search/origin1=/en/on/laws/stat/so-2000-c-41/latest/so-2000-c-41.html&linkedNoteup=&section1=74.1.3"><div class="bootstrap unselectable viibes-marker-toolbox lbh-p-tools" data-with-parag="74.1.3" title="Paragraph tools"><div class="dropdown dropleft"><i data-toggle="dropdown" class="fa-thin fa-pen-to-square"></i><div class="dropdown-menu lbh-p-tools-menu"></div></div></div><P class="section" data-viibes-parag="74.1.3" data-viibes-start="121" data-viibes-end="120"><A name="BK157"></A><B><a name="sec74.1.3subsec1" id="sec74_1_3subsec1"></A><a name="sec74.1.3" id="sec74_1_3"></A>74.1.3 </B><SPAN class="canlii_section_with_subsection" section="74.1.3" subsection="1" alinea="null">(1)</SPAN> A person may apply to the Director for a licence or a renewal of a licence by,</P></div>
 
<P class="paragraph">  (a)  submitting to the Director, in a written or electronic form approved by the Director,</P>
 
<P class="subpara">  (i)  the legal name of the applicant, as well as any operating or business name of the applicant, if different from the legal name,</P>
 
<P class="subpara">  (ii)  the address of every location where the applicant carries on business,</P>
 
<P class="subpara">  (iii)  if the applicant is a corporation, the name and address of each officer or director of the corporation,</P>
 
<P class="subpara">  (iv)  if the applicant is a partnership, the name and address of each partner in the partnership,</P>
 
<P class="subpara">  (v)  if the applicant is applying for a licence to act as a recruiter, </P>
 
<P class="subsubpara">  (A)  a statement that the applicant is aware that subsection 7 (1) of the <I>Employment Protection for Foreign Nationals Act, 2009</I> prohibits a person who acts as a recruiter in connection with the employment of a foreign national from directly or indirectly charging the foreign national a fee for any service, good or benefit provided to the foreign national,</P>
 
<P class="subsubpara">  (B)  a statement that the applicant is aware that <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="24" ss="2" href="#sec24subsec2_smooth">subsection 24 (2)</A> of the <I>Employment Protection for Foreign Nationals Act, 2009</I> provides that if an employment standards officer finds that a recruiter has contravened <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="7" href="#sec7_smooth">section 7</A> of that Act, the officer may order the recruiter to pay the amount of the fees to the foreign national or to the Director of Employment Standards in trust,</P>
 
<P class="subsubpara">  (C)  a statement that the applicant is aware that <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="27" ss="1" href="#sec27subsec1_smooth">subsection 27 (1)</A> of the <I>Employment Protection for Foreign Nationals Act, 2009</I> provides that if an employment standards officer believes that a person has contravened a provision of that Act, the officer may issue a notice to the person setting out the officer’s belief and specifying the amount of the penalty for the contravention,</P>
 
<P class="subsubpara">  (D)  a statement that the applicant is aware that the Director shall refuse to issue a licence or revoke or suspend a licence if the applicant has charged fees to a foreign national in contravention of subsection 7 (1) of the <I>Employment Protection for Foreign Nationals Act, 2009</I>, and</P>
 
<P class="subsubpara">  (E)  a statement confirming that the applicant has not charged fees to a foreign national in contravention of subsection 7 (1) of the <I>Employment Protection for Foreign Nationals Act, 2009</I>,</P>
 
<P class="subpara">  (vi)  if the applicant engages or uses the services of any person, other than an employee of the applicant, in connection with the recruitment or employment of foreign nationals, </P>
 
<P class="subsubpara">  (A)  the name and address of each person so engaged or used, </P>
 
<P class="subsubpara">  (B)  a description of the person’s business,</P>
 
<P class="subsubpara">  (C)  a statement confirming that the applicant has made reasonable inquiries about the person’s business practices with respect to foreign nationals and is satisfied that the person did not charge fees or collect a fee charged to a foreign national in contravention of subsection 7 (1) of the <I>Employment Protection for Foreign Nationals Act, 2009</I>,</P>
 
<P class="subsubpara">  (D)  a statement that the applicant is aware that subsection 18.1 (1) of the <I>Employment Protection for Foreign Nationals Act, 2009</I>
provides that a recruiter who uses the services of another recruiter in connection with the recruitment or employment of a foreign national is jointly and severally liable with the other recruiter to repay fees charged to the foreign national by the other recruiter in contravention of subsection 7 (1) of that Act, and</P>
 
<P class="subsubpara">  (E)  a statement that the applicant is aware that the Director shall refuse to issue a licence or revoke or suspend a licence if the applicant engages or uses the services of a recruiter that charges fees to a foreign national in contravention of subsection 7 (1) of the <I>Employment Protection for Foreign Nationals Act, 2009</I>, and</P>
 
<P class="subpara">  (vii)  such other information or statements as may be prescribed;</P>
 
<P class="paragraph">  (b)  paying the prescribed fee;</P>
 
<P class="paragraph">  (c)  providing the Director with the prescribed security; and</P>
 
<P class="paragraph">  (d)  complying with any additional prescribed requirements. <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="97113-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2021-c-35/latest/so-2021-c-35.html">2021, c. 35</A>, Sched. 2, <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="10" href="#sec10_smooth">s. 10</A>.</P>
 
<a name="sec74.1.3subsec2" id="sec74_1_3subsec2"></A><P class="headnote">Request for information</P>
 
<P class="subsection"><SPAN class="canlii_subsection" section="74.1.3" subsection="2" alinea="null">(2)</SPAN> The Director may request that an applicant provide to the Director, in the form and within the time period specified by the Director, such information as may be specified by the Director that is relevant to the decision as to whether or not to issue a licence or renewal. <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="97113-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2021-c-35/latest/so-2021-c-35.html">2021, c. 35</A>, Sched. 2, <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="10" href="#sec10_smooth">s. 10</A>.</P>
 
<a name="sec74.1.3subsec3" id="sec74_1_3subsec3"></A><P class="headnote">False or misleading information</P>
 
<P class="subsection"><SPAN class="canlii_subsection" section="74.1.3" subsection="3" alinea="null">(3)</SPAN> No person shall provide false or misleading information under this section. <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="97113-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2021-c-35/latest/so-2021-c-35.html">2021, c. 35</A>, Sched. 2, <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="10" href="#sec10_smooth">s. 10</A>.</P>
 
<a name="sec74.1.3subsec4" id="sec74_1_3subsec4"></A><P class="headnote">Addresses</P>
 
<P class="subsection"><SPAN class="canlii_subsection" section="74.1.3" subsection="4" alinea="null">(4)</SPAN> For greater certainty, a requirement to submit an address to the Director under subsection (1) includes addresses in Ontario and outside of Ontario, including outside of Canada. <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="97113-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2021-c-35/latest/so-2021-c-35.html">2021, c. 35</A>, Sched. 2, <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="10" href="#sec10_smooth">s. 10</A>.</P>
 

 
<P class="headnote">Issuance of licence</P>
 
<div class="paragWrapper" data-lbh-p-number="74.1.4" data-lbh-p-anchor="sec74.1.4" data-lbh-p-noteup-link="/en/#search/origin1=/en/on/laws/stat/so-2000-c-41/latest/so-2000-c-41.html&linkedNoteup=&section1=74.1.4"><div class="bootstrap unselectable viibes-marker-toolbox lbh-p-tools" data-with-parag="74.1.4" title="Paragraph tools"><div class="dropdown dropleft"><i data-toggle="dropdown" class="fa-thin fa-pen-to-square"></i><div class="dropdown-menu lbh-p-tools-menu"></div></div></div><P class="section" data-viibes-parag="74.1.4" data-viibes-start="122" data-viibes-end="121"><A name="BK158"></A><B><a name="sec74.1.4" id="sec74_1_4"></A><SPAN class="canlii_section" section="74.1.4" subsection="null" alinea="null">74.1.4</SPAN> The Director shall issue a licence to an applicant or renew an applicant’s licence if the Director,</B></P></div>
 
<P class="paragraph">  (a)  receives an application under <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="74.1.3" href="#sec74.1.3_smooth">section 74.1.3</A>; and</P>
 
<P class="paragraph">  (b)  is satisfied that the applicant,</P>
 
<P class="subpara">  (i)  has complied with any orders issued under this Act or the <I>Employment Protection for Foreign Nationals Act, 2009</I>, and</P>
 
<P class="subpara">  (ii)  meets the requirements set out in this Act and the regulations for the licence. <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="97113-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2021-c-35/latest/so-2021-c-35.html">2021, c. 35</A>, Sched. 2, <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="10" href="#sec10_smooth">s. 10</A>.</P>
 

 
<P class="headnote">Refusal to issue or renew licence</P>
 
<div class="paragWrapper" data-lbh-p-number="74.1.5" data-lbh-p-anchor="sec74.1.5" data-lbh-p-noteup-link="/en/#search/origin1=/en/on/laws/stat/so-2000-c-41/latest/so-2000-c-41.html&linkedNoteup=&section1=74.1.5"><div class="bootstrap unselectable viibes-marker-toolbox lbh-p-tools" data-with-parag="74.1.5" title="Paragraph tools"><div class="dropdown dropleft"><i data-toggle="dropdown" class="fa-thin fa-pen-to-square"></i><div class="dropdown-menu lbh-p-tools-menu"></div></div></div><P class="section" data-viibes-parag="74.1.5" data-viibes-start="123" data-viibes-end="122"><A name="BK159"></A><B><a name="sec74.1.5subsec1" id="sec74_1_5subsec1"></A><a name="sec74.1.5" id="sec74_1_5"></A>74.1.5 </B><SPAN class="canlii_section_with_subsection" section="74.1.5" subsection="1" alinea="null">(1)</SPAN> On receipt of an application under <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="74.1.3" href="#sec74.1.3_smooth">section 74.1.3</A>, the Director shall, in accordance with the prescribed processes, if any, refuse to issue or renew a licence if,</P></div>
 
<P class="paragraph">  (a)  the applicant has not complied with an order issued under this Act or the <I>Employment Protection for Foreign Nationals Act, 2009</I>;</P>
 
<P class="paragraph">  (b)  the applicant has ever charged a fee to a foreign national in contravention of subsection 7 (1) of the Employment Protection for Foreign Nationals Act, 2009 or the applicant engages or uses the services of any person, other than an employee of the applicant, that has ever charged a fee or collected a fee charged to a foreign national in contravention of subsection 7 (1) of that Act;</P>
 
<P class="paragraph">  (c)  the applicant fails to meet the requirements set out in this Act and the regulations for the licence; or</P>
 
<P class="paragraph">  (d)  any other prescribed circumstances exist. <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="97113-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2021-c-35/latest/so-2021-c-35.html">2021, c. 35</A>, Sched. 2, <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="10" href="#sec10_smooth">s. 10</A>.</P>
 
<a name="sec74.1.5subsec2" id="sec74_1_5subsec2"></A><P class="headnote">Same</P>
 
<P class="subsection"><SPAN class="canlii_subsection" section="74.1.5" subsection="2" alinea="null">(2)</SPAN> On receipt of an application under <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="74.1.3" href="#sec74.1.3_smooth">section 74.1.3</A>, the Director may, in accordance with the prescribed processes, if any, refuse to issue or renew a licence if,</P>
 
<P class="paragraph">  (a)  the Director has reasonable grounds to believe that,</P>
 
<P class="subpara">  (i)  based on the past or present conduct of the applicant, or any officers, directors or representatives of the applicant, the applicant will not carry on business with honesty and integrity and in accordance with the law, or</P>
 
<P class="subpara">  (ii)  the applicant has made a false or misleading statement or provided false or misleading information in an application for a licence or a renewal of a licence; or</P>
 
<P class="paragraph">  (b)  any other prescribed circumstances exist. <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="97113-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2021-c-35/latest/so-2021-c-35.html">2021, c. 35</A>, Sched. 2, <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="10" href="#sec10_smooth">s. 10</A>.</P>
 

 
<P class="headnote">Revocation or suspension of licence</P>
 
<div class="paragWrapper" data-lbh-p-number="74.1.6" data-lbh-p-anchor="sec74.1.6" data-lbh-p-noteup-link="/en/#search/origin1=/en/on/laws/stat/so-2000-c-41/latest/so-2000-c-41.html&linkedNoteup=&section1=74.1.6"><div class="bootstrap unselectable viibes-marker-toolbox lbh-p-tools" data-with-parag="74.1.6" title="Paragraph tools"><div class="dropdown dropleft"><i data-toggle="dropdown" class="fa-thin fa-pen-to-square"></i><div class="dropdown-menu lbh-p-tools-menu"></div></div></div><P class="section" data-viibes-parag="74.1.6" data-viibes-start="124" data-viibes-end="123"><A name="BK160"></A><B><a name="sec74.1.6subsec1" id="sec74_1_6subsec1"></A><a name="sec74.1.6" id="sec74_1_6"></A>74.1.6</B> <SPAN class="canlii_section_with_subsection" section="74.1.6" subsection="1" alinea="null">(1)</SPAN> The Director may, in accordance with the prescribed processes, if any, revoke or suspend a licence on any ground on which the Director might have refused to issue or renew the licence under <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="74.1.5" ss="1" href="#sec74.1.5subsec1_smooth">subsection 74.1.5 (1)</A> or <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="74.1.5" ss="2" href="#sec74.1.5subsec2_smooth">(2)</A>. <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="97113-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2021-c-35/latest/so-2021-c-35.html">2021, c. 35</A>, Sched. 2, <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="10" href="#sec10_smooth">s. 10</A>.</P></div>
 
<a name="sec74.1.6subsec2" id="sec74_1_6subsec2"></A><P class="headnote">Reinstatement</P>
 
<P class="subsection"><SPAN class="canlii_subsection" section="74.1.6" subsection="2" alinea="null">(2)</SPAN> If the Director considers it appropriate to do so, the Director may reinstate a licence that has been suspended. <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="97113-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2021-c-35/latest/so-2021-c-35.html">2021, c. 35</A>, Sched. 2, <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="10" href="#sec10_smooth">s. 10</A>.</P>
 

 
<P class="headnote">Notice requirements re: licences</P>
 
<P class="headnote">Director</P>
 
<div class="paragWrapper" data-lbh-p-number="74.1.7" data-lbh-p-anchor="sec74.1.7" data-lbh-p-noteup-link="/en/#search/origin1=/en/on/laws/stat/so-2000-c-41/latest/so-2000-c-41.html&linkedNoteup=&section1=74.1.7"><div class="bootstrap unselectable viibes-marker-toolbox lbh-p-tools" data-with-parag="74.1.7" title="Paragraph tools"><div class="dropdown dropleft"><i data-toggle="dropdown" class="fa-thin fa-pen-to-square"></i><div class="dropdown-menu lbh-p-tools-menu"></div></div></div><P class="section" data-viibes-parag="74.1.7" data-viibes-start="125" data-viibes-end="124"><A name="BK161"></A><B><a name="sec74.1.7subsec1" id="sec74_1_7subsec1"></A><a name="sec74.1.7" id="sec74_1_7"></A>74.1.7</B> <SPAN class="canlii_section_with_subsection" section="74.1.7" subsection="1" alinea="null">(1)</SPAN> If the Director refuses to issue or renew a licence, or revokes or suspends a licence, the Director shall serve notice of the refusal, revocation or suspension on the applicant and shall provide the applicant with written reasons for the refusal, revocation or suspension. <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="97113-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2021-c-35/latest/so-2021-c-35.html">2021, c. 35</A>, Sched. 2, <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="10" href="#sec10_smooth">s. 10</A>.</P></div>
 
<a name="sec74.1.7subsec2" id="sec74_1_7subsec2"></A><P class="headnote">Temporary help agency</P>
 
<P class="subsection"><SPAN class="canlii_subsection" section="74.1.7" subsection="2" alinea="null">(2)</SPAN> A person whose licence to operate a temporary help agency is refused, revoked or suspended shall give written notice of the refusal, revocation or suspension to every client and assignment employee of the agency within 30 days after the day on which the notice of refusal, revocation or suspension is served. <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="97113-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2021-c-35/latest/so-2021-c-35.html">2021, c. 35</A>, Sched. 2, <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="10" href="#sec10_smooth">s. 10</A>.</P>
 
<a name="sec74.1.7subsec3" id="sec74_1_7subsec3"></A><P class="headnote">Recruiter</P>
 
<P class="subsection"><SPAN class="canlii_subsection" section="74.1.7" subsection="3" alinea="null">(3)</SPAN> A person whose licence to act as a recruiter is refused, revoked or suspended shall give written notice of the refusal, revocation or suspension to every employer, prospective employer or prospective employee who has engaged or used the services of the recruiter within 30 days after the day on which the notice of refusal, revocation or suspension is served. <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="97113-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2021-c-35/latest/so-2021-c-35.html">2021, c. 35</A>, Sched. 2, <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="10" href="#sec10_smooth">s. 10</A>.</P>
 
<a name="sec74.1.7subsec4" id="sec74_1_7subsec4"></A><P class="headnote">Applicant for review</P>
 
<P class="subsection"><SPAN class="canlii_subsection" section="74.1.7" subsection="4" alinea="null">(4)</SPAN> If a person applies for an application for review under <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="74.1.13" ss="1" href="#sec74.1.13subsec1_smooth">subsection 74.1.13 (1)</A>, the person shall include that information in the notice required under subsection (2) or (3) of this section. <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="97113-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2021-c-35/latest/so-2021-c-35.html">2021, c. 35</A>, Sched. 2, <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="10" href="#sec10_smooth">s. 10</A>.</P>
 

 
<P class="headnote">Terms and conditions of licence</P>
 
<div class="paragWrapper" data-lbh-p-number="74.1.8" data-lbh-p-anchor="sec74.1.8" data-lbh-p-noteup-link="/en/#search/origin1=/en/on/laws/stat/so-2000-c-41/latest/so-2000-c-41.html&linkedNoteup=&section1=74.1.8"><div class="bootstrap unselectable viibes-marker-toolbox lbh-p-tools" data-with-parag="74.1.8" title="Paragraph tools"><div class="dropdown dropleft"><i data-toggle="dropdown" class="fa-thin fa-pen-to-square"></i><div class="dropdown-menu lbh-p-tools-menu"></div></div></div><P class="section" data-viibes-parag="74.1.8" data-viibes-start="126" data-viibes-end="125"><A name="BK162"></A><B><a name="sec74.1.8" id="sec74_1_8"></A><SPAN class="canlii_section" section="74.1.8" subsection="null" alinea="null">74.1.8</SPAN></B> A licence is subject to such terms and conditions as are prescribed. <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="97113-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2021-c-35/latest/so-2021-c-35.html">2021, c. 35</A>, Sched. 2, <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="10" href="#sec10_smooth">s. 10</A>.</P></div>
 

 
<P class="headnote">Licence not transferable</P>
 
<div class="paragWrapper" data-lbh-p-number="74.1.9" data-lbh-p-anchor="sec74.1.9" data-lbh-p-noteup-link="/en/#search/origin1=/en/on/laws/stat/so-2000-c-41/latest/so-2000-c-41.html&linkedNoteup=&section1=74.1.9"><div class="bootstrap unselectable viibes-marker-toolbox lbh-p-tools" data-with-parag="74.1.9" title="Paragraph tools"><div class="dropdown dropleft"><i data-toggle="dropdown" class="fa-thin fa-pen-to-square"></i><div class="dropdown-menu lbh-p-tools-menu"></div></div></div><P class="section" data-viibes-parag="74.1.9" data-viibes-start="127" data-viibes-end="126"><A name="BK163"></A><B><a name="sec74.1.9" id="sec74_1_9"></A><SPAN class="canlii_section" section="74.1.9" subsection="null" alinea="null">74.1.9</SPAN></B> A licence is not transferable. <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="97113-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2021-c-35/latest/so-2021-c-35.html">2021, c. 35</A>, Sched. 2, <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="10" href="#sec10_smooth">s. 10</A>.</P></div>
 

 
<P class="headnote">Expiry of licence</P>
 
<div class="paragWrapper" data-lbh-p-number="74.1.10" data-lbh-p-anchor="sec74.1.10" data-lbh-p-noteup-link="/en/#search/origin1=/en/on/laws/stat/so-2000-c-41/latest/so-2000-c-41.html&linkedNoteup=&section1=74.1.10"><div class="bootstrap unselectable viibes-marker-toolbox lbh-p-tools" data-with-parag="74.1.10" title="Paragraph tools"><div class="dropdown dropleft"><i data-toggle="dropdown" class="fa-thin fa-pen-to-square"></i><div class="dropdown-menu lbh-p-tools-menu"></div></div></div><P class="section" data-viibes-parag="74.1.10" data-viibes-start="128" data-viibes-end="127"><A name="BK164"></A><B><a name="sec74.1.10subsec1" id="sec74_1_10subsec1"></A><a name="sec74.1.10" id="sec74_1_10"></A>74.1.10 </B> <SPAN class="canlii_section_with_subsection" section="74.1.10" subsection="1" alinea="null">(1)</SPAN> Subject to subsection (2), a licence expires one year after the date it was issued or renewed or on the expiration of such longer period as may be prescribed. <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="97113-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2021-c-35/latest/so-2021-c-35.html">2021, c. 35</A>, Sched. 2, <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="10" href="#sec10_smooth">s. 10</A>.</P></div>
 
<a name="sec74.1.10subsec2" id="sec74_1_10subsec2"></A><P class="headnote">Same, renewal application</P>
 
<P class="subsection"><SPAN class="canlii_subsection" section="74.1.10" subsection="2" alinea="null">(2)</SPAN> If, before a person’s licence expires, the person applies for a licence renewal in accordance with <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="74.1.3" href="#sec74.1.3_smooth">section 74.1.3</A>, the licence remains valid until the licence is renewed or notice of the refusal to renew the licence is served. <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="97113-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2021-c-35/latest/so-2021-c-35.html">2021, c. 35</A>, Sched. 2, <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="10" href="#sec10_smooth">s. 10</A>.</P>
 

 
<P class="headnote">Voluntary cancellation</P>
 
<div class="paragWrapper" data-lbh-p-number="74.1.11" data-lbh-p-anchor="sec74.1.11" data-lbh-p-noteup-link="/en/#search/origin1=/en/on/laws/stat/so-2000-c-41/latest/so-2000-c-41.html&linkedNoteup=&section1=74.1.11"><div class="bootstrap unselectable viibes-marker-toolbox lbh-p-tools" data-with-parag="74.1.11" title="Paragraph tools"><div class="dropdown dropleft"><i data-toggle="dropdown" class="fa-thin fa-pen-to-square"></i><div class="dropdown-menu lbh-p-tools-menu"></div></div></div><P class="section" data-viibes-parag="74.1.11" data-viibes-start="129" data-viibes-end="128"><A name="BK165"></A><B><a name="sec74.1.11subsec1" id="sec74_1_11subsec1"></A><a name="sec74.1.11" id="sec74_1_11"></A>74.1.11 </B><SPAN class="canlii_section_with_subsection" section="74.1.11" subsection="1" alinea="null">(1)</SPAN> The Director may cancel a licence upon the request, in writing, of the licensee. <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="97113-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2021-c-35/latest/so-2021-c-35.html">2021, c. 35</A>, Sched. 2, <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="10" href="#sec10_smooth">s. 10</A>.</P></div>
 
<a name="sec74.1.11subsec2" id="sec74_1_11subsec2"></A><P class="headnote">Same, notice</P>
 
<P class="subsection"><SPAN class="canlii_subsection" section="74.1.11" subsection="2" alinea="null">(2)</SPAN> <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="74.1.7" ss="2" href="#sec74.1.7subsec2_smooth">Subsections 74.1.7 (2)</A> and <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="74.1.7" ss="3" href="#sec74.1.7subsec3_smooth">(3)</A> apply with necessary modifications if a licence is cancelled under this section. <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="97113-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2021-c-35/latest/so-2021-c-35.html">2021, c. 35</A>, Sched. 2, <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="10" href="#sec10_smooth">s. 10</A>.</P>
 

 
<P class="headnote">Public record</P>
 
<div class="paragWrapper" data-lbh-p-number="74.1.12" data-lbh-p-anchor="sec74.1.12" data-lbh-p-noteup-link="/en/#search/origin1=/en/on/laws/stat/so-2000-c-41/latest/so-2000-c-41.html&linkedNoteup=&section1=74.1.12"><div class="bootstrap unselectable viibes-marker-toolbox lbh-p-tools" data-with-parag="74.1.12" title="Paragraph tools"><div class="dropdown dropleft"><i data-toggle="dropdown" class="fa-thin fa-pen-to-square"></i><div class="dropdown-menu lbh-p-tools-menu"></div></div></div><P class="section" data-viibes-parag="74.1.12" data-viibes-start="130" data-viibes-end="129"><A name="BK166"></A><B><a name="sec74.1.12subsec1" id="sec74_1_12subsec1"></A><a name="sec74.1.12" id="sec74_1_12"></A>74.1.12 </B><SPAN class="canlii_section_with_subsection" section="74.1.12" subsection="1" alinea="null">(1)</SPAN> The Director shall publish and maintain, in accordance with such requirements as may be prescribed, a public record of the following on a website of the Government of Ontario:</P></div>
 
<P class="paragraph">  1.  The name of every person licensed under this Act, the date the person’s licence was issued or renewed and the date the person’s licence expires.</P>
 
<P class="paragraph">  2.  The name of every person whose licence has been revoked or suspended under this Act and the date of the revocation or suspension.</P>
 
<P class="paragraph">  3.  Any other prescribed information. <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="97113-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2021-c-35/latest/so-2021-c-35.html">2021, c. 35</A>, Sched. 2, <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="10" href="#sec10_smooth">s. 10</A>.</P>
 
<a name="sec74.1.12subsec2" id="sec74_1_12subsec2"></A><P class="headnote">Freedom of information legislation</P>
 
<P class="subsection"><SPAN class="canlii_subsection" section="74.1.12" subsection="2" alinea="null">(2)</SPAN> The disclosure of personal information in a public record under this section is deemed to be in compliance with <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="169-current-1" s="42" ss="1" href="/en/on/laws/stat/rso-1990-c-f31/latest/rso-1990-c-f31.html#sec42subsec1_smooth">clause 42 (1)</A> (e) of the <I><A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="169-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/stat/rso-1990-c-f31/latest/rso-1990-c-f31.html">Freedom of Information and Protection of Privacy Act</A></I>. <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="97113-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2021-c-35/latest/so-2021-c-35.html">2021, c. 35</A>, Sched. 2, <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="10" href="#sec10_smooth">s. 10</A>.</P>
 

 
<P class="headnote">Application for review</P>
 
<div class="paragWrapper" data-lbh-p-number="74.1.13" data-lbh-p-anchor="sec74.1.13" data-lbh-p-noteup-link="/en/#search/origin1=/en/on/laws/stat/so-2000-c-41/latest/so-2000-c-41.html&linkedNoteup=&section1=74.1.13"><div class="bootstrap unselectable viibes-marker-toolbox lbh-p-tools" data-with-parag="74.1.13" title="Paragraph tools"><div class="dropdown dropleft"><i data-toggle="dropdown" class="fa-thin fa-pen-to-square"></i><div class="dropdown-menu lbh-p-tools-menu"></div></div></div><P class="section" data-viibes-parag="74.1.13" data-viibes-start="131" data-viibes-end="130"><A name="BK167"></A><B><a name="sec74.1.13subsec1" id="sec74_1_13subsec1"></A><a name="sec74.1.13" id="sec74_1_13"></A>74.1.13 </B><SPAN class="canlii_section_with_subsection" section="74.1.13" subsection="1" alinea="null">(1)</SPAN> A person whose application for a licence has been refused under <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="74.1.5" href="#sec74.1.5_smooth">section 74.1.5</A> or whose licence has been revoked or suspended under <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="74.1.6" href="#sec74.1.6_smooth">section 74.1.6</A> is entitled to a review of the refusal, revocation or suspension by the Board if the person applies to the Board, in writing, for a review within the period set out in subsection (2). <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="97113-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2021-c-35/latest/so-2021-c-35.html">2021, c. 35</A>, Sched. 2, <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="10" href="#sec10_smooth">s. 10</A>.</P></div>
 
<a name="sec74.1.13subsec2" id="sec74_1_13subsec2"></A><P class="headnote">Period for applying for review</P>
 
<P class="subsection"><SPAN class="canlii_subsection" section="74.1.13" subsection="2" alinea="null">(2)</SPAN> An application for a review under subsection (1) shall be made within 30 days after the day on which notice of the refusal, revocation or suspension is served. <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="97113-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2021-c-35/latest/so-2021-c-35.html">2021, c. 35</A>, Sched. 2, <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="10" href="#sec10_smooth">s. 10</A>.</P>
 
<a name="sec74.1.13subsec3" id="sec74_1_13subsec3"></A><P class="headnote">Hearing</P>
 
<P class="subsection"><SPAN class="canlii_subsection" section="74.1.13" subsection="3" alinea="null">(3)</SPAN> Subject to <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="118" ss="2" href="#sec118subsec2_smooth">subsection 118 (2)</A>, the Board shall hold a hearing for the purposes of the review. <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="97113-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2021-c-35/latest/so-2021-c-35.html">2021, c. 35</A>, Sched. 2, <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="10" href="#sec10_smooth">s. 10</A>.</P>
 
<a name="sec74.1.13subsec4" id="sec74_1_13subsec4"></A><P class="headnote">Same, timelines</P>
 
<P class="subsection"><SPAN class="canlii_subsection" section="74.1.13" subsection="4" alinea="null">(4)</SPAN> A review hearing shall be conducted in accordance with any timelines prescribed. <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="97113-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2021-c-35/latest/so-2021-c-35.html">2021, c. 35</A>, Sched. 2, <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="10" href="#sec10_smooth">s. 10</A>.</P>
 
<a name="sec74.1.13subsec5" id="sec74_1_13subsec5"></A><P class="headnote">Parties</P>
 
<P class="subsection"><SPAN class="canlii_subsection" section="74.1.13" subsection="5" alinea="null">(5)</SPAN> The parties to the review are the applicant for review and the Director. <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="97113-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2021-c-35/latest/so-2021-c-35.html">2021, c. 35</A>, Sched. 2, <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="10" href="#sec10_smooth">s. 10</A>.</P>
 
<a name="sec74.1.13subsec6" id="sec74_1_13subsec6"></A><P class="headnote">Powers of Board</P>
 
<P class="subsection"><SPAN class="canlii_subsection" section="74.1.13" subsection="6" alinea="null">(6)</SPAN> The Board may, with necessary modifications, exercise the powers conferred on the Director under this Part and may substitute its findings for those of the Director. <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="97113-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2021-c-35/latest/so-2021-c-35.html">2021, c. 35</A>, Sched. 2, <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="10" href="#sec10_smooth">s. 10</A>.</P>
 
<a name="sec74.1.13subsec7" id="sec74_1_13subsec7"></A><P class="headnote">Same</P>
 
<P class="subsection"><SPAN class="canlii_subsection" section="74.1.13" subsection="7" alinea="null">(7)</SPAN> Without limiting the generality of subsection (6), on a review under this section, the Board may uphold the Director’s decision, vary or set aside the Director’s decision or issue, renew or reinstate a licence. <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="97113-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2021-c-35/latest/so-2021-c-35.html">2021, c. 35</A>, Sched. 2, <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="10" href="#sec10_smooth">s. 10</A>.</P>
 
<a name="sec74.1.13subsec8" id="sec74_1_13subsec8"></A><P class="headnote">Notice of decision</P>
 
<P class="subsection"><SPAN class="canlii_subsection" section="74.1.13" subsection="8" alinea="null">(8)</SPAN> If the Board upholds the Director’s decision to refuse to issue or renew, or to revoke or suspend, a person’s licence to operate a temporary help agency, the person shall give written notice of the refusal, revocation or suspension to every client and assignment employee of the agency within 30 days after the Board issues its decision. <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="97113-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2021-c-35/latest/so-2021-c-35.html">2021, c. 35</A>, Sched. 2, <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="10" href="#sec10_smooth">s. 10</A>.</P>
 
<a name="sec74.1.13subsec9" id="sec74_1_13subsec9"></A><P class="headnote">Same</P>
 
<P class="subsection"><SPAN class="canlii_subsection" section="74.1.13" subsection="9" alinea="null">(9)</SPAN> If the Board upholds the Director’s decision to refuse to issue or renew, or to revoke or suspend, a person’s licence to act as a recruiter, the person shall give written notice of the refusal, revocation or suspension to every employer, prospective employer and prospective employee who has engaged or used the services of the recruiter within 30 days after the Board issues its decision. <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="97113-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2021-c-35/latest/so-2021-c-35.html">2021, c. 35</A>, Sched. 2, <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="10" href="#sec10_smooth">s. 10</A>.</P>
 
<a name="sec74.1.13subsec10" id="sec74_1_13subsec10"></A><P class="headnote">Certain review provisions applicable</P>
 
<P class="subsection"><SPAN class="canlii_subsection" section="74.1.13" subsection="10" alinea="null">(10)</SPAN> <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="116" ss="8" href="#sec116subsec8_smooth">Subsections 116 (8)</A> and <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="116" ss="9" href="#sec116subsec9_smooth">(9)</A>, <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="118" href="#sec118_smooth">section 118</A> and <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="119" ss="3" href="#sec119subsec3_smooth">subsections 119 (3)</A>, <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="119" ss="4" href="#sec119subsec4_smooth">(4)</A>, <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="119" ss="5" href="#sec119subsec5_smooth">(5)</A>, <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="119" ss="13" href="#sec119subsec13_smooth">(13)</A> and <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="119" ss="14" href="#sec119subsec14_smooth">(14)</A> apply, with necessary modifications, to a review under this section. <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="97113-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2021-c-35/latest/so-2021-c-35.html">2021, c. 35</A>, Sched. 2, <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="10" href="#sec10_smooth">s. 10</A>.</P>
 

 
<P class="headnote">Further application</P>
 
<div class="paragWrapper" data-lbh-p-number="74.1.14" data-lbh-p-anchor="sec74.1.14" data-lbh-p-noteup-link="/en/#search/origin1=/en/on/laws/stat/so-2000-c-41/latest/so-2000-c-41.html&linkedNoteup=&section1=74.1.14"><div class="bootstrap unselectable viibes-marker-toolbox lbh-p-tools" data-with-parag="74.1.14" title="Paragraph tools"><div class="dropdown dropleft"><i data-toggle="dropdown" class="fa-thin fa-pen-to-square"></i><div class="dropdown-menu lbh-p-tools-menu"></div></div></div><P class="section" data-viibes-parag="74.1.14" data-viibes-start="132" data-viibes-end="131"><A name="BK168"></A><B><a name="sec74.1.14" id="sec74_1_14"></A><SPAN class="canlii_section" section="74.1.14" subsection="null" alinea="null">74.1.14</SPAN> </B>No applicant who is refused a licence or renewal of a licence or whose licence is revoked may apply to the Director for a licence unless,</P></div>
 
<P class="paragraph">  (a)  at least two years have passed since the refusal or revocation; or</P>
 
<P class="paragraph">  (b)  the applicant satisfies the Director that new evidence is available. <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="97113-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2021-c-35/latest/so-2021-c-35.html">2021, c. 35</A>, Sched. 2, <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="10" href="#sec10_smooth">s. 10</A>.</P>
 

 
<P class="headnote">Director’s authorization</P>
 
<div class="paragWrapper" data-lbh-p-number="74.1.15" data-lbh-p-anchor="sec74.1.15" data-lbh-p-noteup-link="/en/#search/origin1=/en/on/laws/stat/so-2000-c-41/latest/so-2000-c-41.html&linkedNoteup=&section1=74.1.15"><div class="bootstrap unselectable viibes-marker-toolbox lbh-p-tools" data-with-parag="74.1.15" title="Paragraph tools"><div class="dropdown dropleft"><i data-toggle="dropdown" class="fa-thin fa-pen-to-square"></i><div class="dropdown-menu lbh-p-tools-menu"></div></div></div><P class="section" data-viibes-parag="74.1.15" data-viibes-start="133" data-viibes-end="132"><A name="BK169"></A><B><a name="sec74.1.15subsec1" id="sec74_1_15subsec1"></A><a name="sec74.1.15" id="sec74_1_15"></A>74.1.15 </B><SPAN class="canlii_section_with_subsection" section="74.1.15" subsection="1" alinea="null">(1)</SPAN> The Director may authorize an individual employed in the Ministry to exercise a power conferred on the Director under <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="74.1" href="#sec74.1_smooth">sections 74.1</A> to <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="74.1.14" href="#sec74.1.14_smooth">74.1.14</A>, either orally or in writing. <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="97113-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2021-c-35/latest/so-2021-c-35.html">2021, c. 35</A>, Sched. 2, <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="10" href="#sec10_smooth">s. 10</A>.</P></div>
 
<a name="sec74.1.15subsec2" id="sec74_1_15subsec2"></A><P class="headnote">Residual power</P>
 
<P class="subsection"><SPAN class="canlii_subsection" section="74.1.15" subsection="2" alinea="null">(2)</SPAN> The Director may exercise a power conferred on the Director under <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="74.1" href="#sec74.1_smooth">sections 74.1</A> to <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="74.1.14" href="#sec74.1.14_smooth">74.1.14</A> even if the Director has delegated it to an individual under subsection (1). <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="97113-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2021-c-35/latest/so-2021-c-35.html">2021, c. 35</A>, Sched. 2, <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="10" href="#sec10_smooth">s. 10</A>.</P>
 
<a name="sec74.1.15subsec3" id="sec74_1_15subsec3"></A><P class="headnote">Duty re: policies</P>
 
<P class="subsection"><SPAN class="canlii_subsection" section="74.1.15" subsection="3" alinea="null">(3)</SPAN> An individual authorized by the Director under subsection (1) shall follow any policies established by the Director under <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="88" ss="2" href="#sec88subsec2_smooth">subsection 88 (2)</A>. <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="97113-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2021-c-35/latest/so-2021-c-35.html">2021, c. 35</A>, Sched. 2, <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="10" href="#sec10_smooth">s. 10</A>.</P>
 

 
<A name="Interpretation_and_Application__301915"></A><P class="heading1"><A name="BK170"></A>Interpretation and Application</P>
 
<P class="headnote">Definitions</P>
 
<div class="paragWrapper" data-lbh-p-number="74.2" data-lbh-p-anchor="sec74.2" data-lbh-p-noteup-link="/en/#search/origin1=/en/on/laws/stat/so-2000-c-41/latest/so-2000-c-41.html&linkedNoteup=&section1=74.2"><div class="bootstrap unselectable viibes-marker-toolbox lbh-p-tools" data-with-parag="74.2" title="Paragraph tools"><div class="dropdown dropleft"><i data-toggle="dropdown" class="fa-thin fa-message-pen" data-noteup-count="1" data-noteup-count-display="1"></i><div class="dropdown-menu lbh-p-tools-menu"></div></div></div><P class="section" data-viibes-parag="74.2" data-viibes-start="134" data-viibes-end="133"><A name="BK171"></A><B><a name="sec74.2" id="sec74_2"></A><SPAN class="canlii_section" section="74.2" subsection="null" alinea="null">74.2</SPAN> </B>For the purposes of <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="5" href="#sec5_smooth">sections 5</A>, <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="102" href="#sec102_smooth">102</A> and <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="102.1" href="#sec102.1_smooth">102.1</A>, Part XXVII (Regulations) and such other sections of this Act as may be prescribed insofar as matters concerning this Part are concerned,</P></div>
 
<P class="definition">“employee” means an employee as defined in <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="1" ss="1" href="#sec1subsec1_smooth">subsection 1 (1)</A> and includes a prospective assignment employee or a prospective employee who engages or uses the services of a recruiter to find employment in Ontario; (“employé”)</P>
 
<P class="definition">“employer” means an employer as defined in <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="1" ss="1" href="#sec1subsec1_smooth">subsection 1 (1)</A> and includes a client of a temporary help agency, a recruiter or a prospective employer who engages or uses the services of a recruiter to find or attempt to find an employee. (“employeur”) <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="97113-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2021-c-35/latest/so-2021-c-35.html">2021, c. 35</A>, Sched. 2, <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="11" href="#sec11_smooth">s. 11</A>.</P>
 

 
<div class="paragWrapper" data-lbh-p-number="74.2.1" data-lbh-p-anchor="sec74.2.1" data-lbh-p-noteup-link="/en/#search/origin1=/en/on/laws/stat/so-2000-c-41/latest/so-2000-c-41.html&linkedNoteup=&section1=74.2.1"><div class="bootstrap unselectable viibes-marker-toolbox lbh-p-tools" data-with-parag="74.2.1" title="Paragraph tools"><div class="dropdown dropleft"><i data-toggle="dropdown" class="fa-thin fa-message-pen" data-noteup-count="1" data-noteup-count-display="1"></i><div class="dropdown-menu lbh-p-tools-menu"></div></div></div><P class="section" data-viibes-parag="74.2.1" data-viibes-start="135" data-viibes-end="134"><B><a name="sec74.2.1" id="sec74_2_1"></A><SPAN class="canlii_section" section="74.2.1" subsection="null" alinea="null">74.2.1 </SPAN></B>Repealed: <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="97029-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2019-c-5/latest/so-2019-c-5.html">2019, c. 5</A>, Sched. 3, <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="6" href="#sec6_smooth">s. 6</A>.</P></div>
 

 
<P class="headnote">Employment relationship</P>
 
<div class="paragWrapper" data-lbh-p-number="74.3" data-lbh-p-anchor="sec74.3" data-lbh-p-noteup-link="/en/#search/origin1=/en/on/laws/stat/so-2000-c-41/latest/so-2000-c-41.html&linkedNoteup=&section1=74.3"><div class="bootstrap unselectable viibes-marker-toolbox lbh-p-tools" data-with-parag="74.3" title="Paragraph tools"><div class="dropdown dropleft"><i data-toggle="dropdown" class="fa-thin fa-message-pen" data-noteup-count="6" data-noteup-count-display="6"></i><div class="dropdown-menu lbh-p-tools-menu"></div></div></div><P class="section" data-viibes-parag="74.3" data-viibes-start="136" data-viibes-end="135"><A name="BK172"></A><B><a name="sec74.3" id="sec74_3"></A><SPAN class="canlii_section" section="74.3" subsection="null" alinea="null">74.3</SPAN> </B>Where a temporary help agency and a person agree, whether or not in writing, that the agency will assign or attempt to assign the person to perform work on a temporary basis for clients or potential clients of the agency,</P></div>
 
<P class="paragraph">  (a)  the temporary help agency is the person’s employer;</P>
 
<P class="paragraph">  (b)  the person is an employee of the temporary help agency.  <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="96780-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2009-c-9/latest/so-2009-c-9.html">2009, c. 9, s. 3</A>.</P>
 

 
<P class="headnote">Work assignment</P>
 
<div class="paragWrapper" data-lbh-p-number="74.4" data-lbh-p-anchor="sec74.4" data-lbh-p-noteup-link="/en/#search/origin1=/en/on/laws/stat/so-2000-c-41/latest/so-2000-c-41.html&linkedNoteup=&section1=74.4"><div class="bootstrap unselectable viibes-marker-toolbox lbh-p-tools" data-with-parag="74.4" title="Paragraph tools"><div class="dropdown dropleft"><i data-toggle="dropdown" class="fa-thin fa-message-pen" data-noteup-count="1" data-noteup-count-display="1"></i><div class="dropdown-menu lbh-p-tools-menu"></div></div></div><P class="section" data-viibes-parag="74.4" data-viibes-start="137" data-viibes-end="136"><A name="BK173"></A><B><a name="sec74.4subsec1" id="sec74_4subsec1"></A><a name="sec74.4" id="sec74_4"></A>74.4 </B><SPAN class="canlii_section_with_subsection" section="74.4" subsection="1" alinea="null">(1)</SPAN> An assignment employee of a temporary help agency is assigned to perform work for a client if the agency arranges for the employee to perform work for a client on a temporary basis and the employee performs such work for the client.  <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="96780-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2009-c-9/latest/so-2009-c-9.html">2009, c. 9, s. 3</A>.</P></div>
 
<a name="sec74.4subsec2" id="sec74_4subsec2"></A><P class="headnote">Same</P>
 
<P class="subsection"><SPAN class="canlii_subsection" section="74.4" subsection="2" alinea="null">(2)</SPAN> Where an assignment employee is assigned by a temporary help agency to perform work for a client of the agency, the assignment begins on the first day on which the assignment employee performs work under the assignment and ends at the end of the term of the assignment or when the assignment is ended by the agency, the employee or the client.  <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="96780-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2009-c-9/latest/so-2009-c-9.html">2009, c. 9, s. 3</A>.</P>
 
<a name="sec74.4subsec3" id="sec74_4subsec3"></A><P class="headnote">Same</P>
 
<P class="subsection"><SPAN class="canlii_subsection" section="74.4" subsection="3" alinea="null">(3)</SPAN> An assignment employee of a temporary help agency does not cease to be the agency’s assignment employee because,</P>
 
<P class="paragraph">  (a)  he or she is assigned by the agency to perform work for a client on a temporary basis; or</P>
 
<P class="paragraph">  (b)  he or she is not assigned by the agency to perform work for a client on a temporary basis.  <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="96780-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2009-c-9/latest/so-2009-c-9.html">2009, c. 9, s. 3</A>.</P>
 
<a name="sec74.4subsec4" id="sec74_4subsec4"></A><P class="headnote">Same</P>
 
<P class="subsection"><SPAN class="canlii_subsection" section="74.4" subsection="4" alinea="null">(4)</SPAN> An assignment employee of a temporary help agency is not assigned to perform work for a client because the agency has,</P>
 
<P class="paragraph">  (a)  provided the client with the employee’s resume;</P>
 
<P class="paragraph">  (b)  arranged for the client to interview the employee; or</P>
 
<P class="paragraph">  (c)  otherwise introduced the employee to the client.  <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="96780-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2009-c-9/latest/so-2009-c-9.html">2009, c. 9, s. 3</A>.</P>
 

 
<A name="Obligations_and_Prohibitions__305123"></A><P class="heading1"><A name="BK174"></A>Obligations and Prohibitions</P>
 
<P class="headnote">Agency to keep records re: work for client, termination</P>
 
<div class="paragWrapper" data-lbh-p-number="74.4.1" data-lbh-p-anchor="sec74.4.1" data-lbh-p-noteup-link="/en/#search/origin1=/en/on/laws/stat/so-2000-c-41/latest/so-2000-c-41.html&linkedNoteup=&section1=74.4.1"><div class="bootstrap unselectable viibes-marker-toolbox lbh-p-tools" data-with-parag="74.4.1" title="Paragraph tools"><div class="dropdown dropleft"><i data-toggle="dropdown" class="fa-thin fa-pen-to-square"></i><div class="dropdown-menu lbh-p-tools-menu"></div></div></div><P class="section" data-viibes-parag="74.4.1" data-viibes-start="138" data-viibes-end="137"><A name="BK175"></A><B><a name="sec74.4.1subsec1" id="sec74_4_1subsec1"></A><a name="sec74.4.1" id="sec74_4_1"></A>74.4.1 </B><SPAN class="canlii_section_with_subsection" section="74.4.1" subsection="1" alinea="null">(1)</SPAN> In addition to the information that an employer is required to record under Part VI, a temporary help agency shall,</P></div>
 
<P class="paragraph">  (a)  record the number of hours worked by each assignment employee for each client of the agency in each day and each week; and</P>
 
<P class="paragraph">  (b)  retain a copy of any written notice provided to an assignment employee under <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="74.10.1" ss="1" href="#sec74.10.1subsec1_smooth">subsection 74.10.1 (1)</A>. <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="96994-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2017-c-22/latest/so-2017-c-22.html">2017, c. 22</A>, Sched. 1, <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="43" href="#sec43_smooth">s. 43</A>.</P>
 
<a name="sec74.4.1subsec2" id="sec74_4_1subsec2"></A><P class="headnote">Retention of records</P>
 
<P class="subsection"><SPAN class="canlii_subsection" section="74.4.1" subsection="2" alinea="null">(2)</SPAN> The temporary help agency shall retain or arrange for some other person to retain the records required under subsection (1) for three years after the day or week to which the information relates. <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="96891-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2014-c-10/latest/so-2014-c-10.html">2014, c. 10</A>, Sched. 2, <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="4" href="#sec4_smooth">s. 4</A>.</P>
 
<a name="sec74.4.1subsec3" id="sec74_4_1subsec3"></A><P class="headnote">Availability</P>
 
<P class="subsection"><SPAN class="canlii_subsection" section="74.4.1" subsection="3" alinea="null">(3)</SPAN> The temporary help agency shall ensure that the records required to be retained under this section are readily available for inspection as required by an employment standards officer, even if the agency has arranged for another person to retain them. <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="96891-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2014-c-10/latest/so-2014-c-10.html">2014, c. 10</A>, Sched. 2, <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="4" href="#sec4_smooth">s. 4</A>.</P>
 

 
<P class="headnote">Client to keep records re: work for client</P>
 
<div class="paragWrapper" data-lbh-p-number="74.4.2" data-lbh-p-anchor="sec74.4.2" data-lbh-p-noteup-link="/en/#search/origin1=/en/on/laws/stat/so-2000-c-41/latest/so-2000-c-41.html&linkedNoteup=&section1=74.4.2"><div class="bootstrap unselectable viibes-marker-toolbox lbh-p-tools" data-with-parag="74.4.2" title="Paragraph tools"><div class="dropdown dropleft"><i data-toggle="dropdown" class="fa-thin fa-pen-to-square"></i><div class="dropdown-menu lbh-p-tools-menu"></div></div></div><P class="section" data-viibes-parag="74.4.2" data-viibes-start="139" data-viibes-end="138"><A name="BK176"></A><B><a name="sec74.4.2subsec1" id="sec74_4_2subsec1"></A><a name="sec74.4.2" id="sec74_4_2"></A>74.4.2 </B><SPAN class="canlii_section_with_subsection" section="74.4.2" subsection="1" alinea="null">(1)</SPAN> A client of a temporary help agency shall record the following information:</P></div>
 
<P class="paragraph">  1.  The name of each assignment employee assigned to perform work for the client.</P>
 
<P class="paragraph">  2.  The number of hours worked by each assignment employee assigned to perform work for the client in each day and each week. <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="97113-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2021-c-35/latest/so-2021-c-35.html">2021, c. 35</A>, Sched. 2, <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="13" href="#sec13_smooth">s. 13</A>.</P>
 
<a name="sec74.4.2subsec2" id="sec74_4_2subsec2"></A><P class="headnote">Retention of records</P>
 
<P class="subsection"><SPAN class="canlii_subsection" section="74.4.2" subsection="2" alinea="null">(2)</SPAN> The client shall retain or arrange for some other person to retain the records required under subsection (1) for three years after the day or week to which the information relates. <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="96891-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2014-c-10/latest/so-2014-c-10.html">2014, c. 10</A>, Sched. 2, <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="4" href="#sec4_smooth">s. 4</A>.</P>
 
<a name="sec74.4.2subsec3" id="sec74_4_2subsec3"></A><P class="headnote">Availability</P>
 
<P class="subsection"><SPAN class="canlii_subsection" section="74.4.2" subsection="3" alinea="null">(3)</SPAN> The client shall ensure that the records required to be retained under this section are readily available for inspection as required by an employment standards officer, even if the client has arranged for another person to retain them. <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="96891-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2014-c-10/latest/so-2014-c-10.html">2014, c. 10</A>, Sched. 2, <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="4" href="#sec4_smooth">s. 4</A>.</P>
 

 
<P class="headnote">Recruiters to keep records</P>
 
<div class="paragWrapper" data-lbh-p-number="74.4.3" data-lbh-p-anchor="sec74.4.3" data-lbh-p-noteup-link="/en/#search/origin1=/en/on/laws/stat/so-2000-c-41/latest/so-2000-c-41.html&linkedNoteup=&section1=74.4.3"><div class="bootstrap unselectable viibes-marker-toolbox lbh-p-tools" data-with-parag="74.4.3" title="Paragraph tools"><div class="dropdown dropleft"><i data-toggle="dropdown" class="fa-thin fa-pen-to-square"></i><div class="dropdown-menu lbh-p-tools-menu"></div></div></div><P class="section" data-viibes-parag="74.4.3" data-viibes-start="140" data-viibes-end="139"><A name="BK177"></A><B><a name="sec74.4.3subsec1" id="sec74_4_3subsec1"></A><a name="sec74.4.3" id="sec74_4_3"></A>74.4.3 </B><SPAN class="canlii_section_with_subsection" section="74.4.3" subsection="1" alinea="null">(1)</SPAN> A recruiter shall record the following information:</P></div>
 
<P class="paragraph">  1.  The name of each prospective employee who uses the recruiter to find or attempt to find employment.</P>
 
<P class="paragraph">  2.  The name and address of each employer or prospective employer who has engaged or used the services of the recruiter.</P>
 
<P class="paragraph">  3.  Such other information as may be prescribed. <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="97113-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2021-c-35/latest/so-2021-c-35.html">2021, c. 35</A>, Sched. 2, <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="14" href="#sec14_smooth">s. 14</A>.</P>
 
<a name="sec74.4.3subsec2" id="sec74_4_3subsec2"></A><P class="headnote">Records retention</P>
 
<P class="subsection"><SPAN class="canlii_subsection" section="74.4.3" subsection="2" alinea="null">(2)</SPAN> The recruiter shall retain or arrange for some other person to retain the records required under subsection (1) for three years after the recruiter ceases to provide services to the prospective employee, employer or prospective employer. <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="97113-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2021-c-35/latest/so-2021-c-35.html">2021, c. 35</A>, Sched. 2, <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="14" href="#sec14_smooth">s. 14</A>.</P>
 
<a name="sec74.4.3subsec3" id="sec74_4_3subsec3"></A><P class="headnote">Availability for inspection</P>
 
<P class="subsection"><SPAN class="canlii_subsection" section="74.4.3" subsection="3" alinea="null">(3)</SPAN> The recruiter shall ensure that the records required to be retained under this section are readily available for inspection as required by an employment standards officer, even if the recruiter has arranged for another person to retain them. <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="97113-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2021-c-35/latest/so-2021-c-35.html">2021, c. 35</A>, Sched. 2, <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="14" href="#sec14_smooth">s. 14</A>.</P>
 

 
<P class="headnote">Information re agency</P>
 
<div class="paragWrapper" data-lbh-p-number="74.5" data-lbh-p-anchor="sec74.5" data-lbh-p-noteup-link="/en/#search/origin1=/en/on/laws/stat/so-2000-c-41/latest/so-2000-c-41.html&linkedNoteup=&section1=74.5"><div class="bootstrap unselectable viibes-marker-toolbox lbh-p-tools" data-with-parag="74.5" title="Paragraph tools"><div class="dropdown dropleft"><i data-toggle="dropdown" class="fa-thin fa-pen-to-square"></i><div class="dropdown-menu lbh-p-tools-menu"></div></div></div><P class="section" data-viibes-parag="74.5" data-viibes-start="141" data-viibes-end="140"><A name="BK178"></A><B><a name="sec74.5subsec1" id="sec74_5subsec1"></A><a name="sec74.5" id="sec74_5"></A>74.5 </B><SPAN class="canlii_section_with_subsection" section="74.5" subsection="1" alinea="null">(1)</SPAN> As soon as possible after a person becomes an assignment employee of a temporary help agency, the agency shall provide the following information, in writing, to the employee:</P></div>
 
<P class="paragraph">  1.  The legal name of the agency, as well as any operating or business name of the agency if different from the legal name.</P>
 
<P class="paragraph">  2.  Contact information for the agency, including address, telephone number and one or more contact names.  <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="96780-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2009-c-9/latest/so-2009-c-9.html">2009, c. 9, s. 3</A>.</P>
 
<a name="sec74.5subsec2" id="sec74_5subsec2"></A><P class="headnote">Transition</P>
 
<P class="subsection"><SPAN class="canlii_subsection" section="74.5" subsection="2" alinea="null">(2)</SPAN> Where a person is an assignment employee of a temporary help agency on the day this section comes into force, the agency shall, as soon as possible after that day, provide the information required by subsection (1), in writing, to the employee.  <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="96780-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2009-c-9/latest/so-2009-c-9.html">2009, c. 9, s. 3</A>.</P>
 

 
<P class="headnote">Information re assignment</P>
 
<div class="paragWrapper" data-lbh-p-number="74.6" data-lbh-p-anchor="sec74.6" data-lbh-p-noteup-link="/en/#search/origin1=/en/on/laws/stat/so-2000-c-41/latest/so-2000-c-41.html&linkedNoteup=&section1=74.6"><div class="bootstrap unselectable viibes-marker-toolbox lbh-p-tools" data-with-parag="74.6" title="Paragraph tools"><div class="dropdown dropleft"><i data-toggle="dropdown" class="fa-thin fa-message-pen" data-noteup-count="2" data-noteup-count-display="2"></i><div class="dropdown-menu lbh-p-tools-menu"></div></div></div><P class="section" data-viibes-parag="74.6" data-viibes-start="142" data-viibes-end="141"><A name="BK179"></A><B><a name="sec74.6subsec1" id="sec74_6subsec1"></A><a name="sec74.6" id="sec74_6"></A>74.6 </B><SPAN class="canlii_section_with_subsection" section="74.6" subsection="1" alinea="null">(1)</SPAN> A temporary help agency shall provide the following information when offering a work assignment with a client to an assignment employee:</P></div>
 
<P class="paragraph">  1.  The legal name of the client, as well as any operating or business name of the client if different from the legal name.</P>
 
<P class="paragraph">  2.  Contact information for the client, including address, telephone number and one or more contact names.</P>
 
<P class="paragraph">  3.  The hourly or other wage rate or commission, as applicable, and benefits associated with the assignment.</P>
 
<P class="paragraph">  4.  The hours of work associated with the assignment.</P>
 
<P class="paragraph">  5.  A general description of the work to be performed on the assignment.</P>
 
<P class="paragraph">  6.  The pay period and pay day established by the agency in accordance with <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="11" ss="1" href="#sec11subsec1_smooth">subsection 11 (1)</A>.</P>
 
<P class="paragraph">  7.  The estimated term of the assignment, if the information is available at the time of the offer.  <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="96780-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2009-c-9/latest/so-2009-c-9.html">2009, c. 9, s. 3</A>.</P>
 
<a name="sec74.6subsec2" id="sec74_6subsec2"></A><P class="headnote">Same</P>
 
<P class="subsection"><SPAN class="canlii_subsection" section="74.6" subsection="2" alinea="null">(2)</SPAN> If information required by subsection (1) is provided orally to the assignment employee, the temporary help agency shall also provide the information to the assignment employee in writing, as soon as possible after offering the work assignment.  <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="96780-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2009-c-9/latest/so-2009-c-9.html">2009, c. 9, s. 3</A>.</P>
 
<a name="sec74.6subsec3" id="sec74_6subsec3"></A><P class="headnote">Transition</P>
 
<P class="subsection"><SPAN class="canlii_subsection" section="74.6" subsection="3" alinea="null">(3)</SPAN> Where an assignment employee is on a work assignment with a client of a temporary help agency or has been offered such an assignment on the day this section comes into force, the agency shall, as soon as possible after that day, provide the information required by subsection (1), in writing, to the employee.  <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="96780-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2009-c-9/latest/so-2009-c-9.html">2009, c. 9, s. 3</A>.</P>
 

 
<P class="headnote">Information, rights under this Act</P>
 
<div class="paragWrapper" data-lbh-p-number="74.7" data-lbh-p-anchor="sec74.7" data-lbh-p-noteup-link="/en/#search/origin1=/en/on/laws/stat/so-2000-c-41/latest/so-2000-c-41.html&linkedNoteup=&section1=74.7"><div class="bootstrap unselectable viibes-marker-toolbox lbh-p-tools" data-with-parag="74.7" title="Paragraph tools"><div class="dropdown dropleft"><i data-toggle="dropdown" class="fa-thin fa-pen-to-square"></i><div class="dropdown-menu lbh-p-tools-menu"></div></div></div><P class="section" data-viibes-parag="74.7" data-viibes-start="143" data-viibes-end="142"><A name="BK180"></A><B><a name="sec74.7subsec1" id="sec74_7subsec1"></A><a name="sec74.7" id="sec74_7"></A>74.7 </B><SPAN class="canlii_section_with_subsection" section="74.7" subsection="1" alinea="null">(1)</SPAN> The Director shall prepare and publish a document providing such information about the rights and obligations of assignment employees, temporary help agencies and clients under this Part as the Director considers appropriate.  <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="96780-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2009-c-9/latest/so-2009-c-9.html">2009, c. 9, s. 3</A>.</P></div>
 
<a name="sec74.7subsec2" id="sec74_7subsec2"></A><P class="headnote">Same</P>
 
<P class="subsection"><SPAN class="canlii_subsection" section="74.7" subsection="2" alinea="null">(2)</SPAN> If the Director believes that a document prepared under subsection (1) has become out of date, the Director shall prepare and publish a new document.  <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="96780-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2009-c-9/latest/so-2009-c-9.html">2009, c. 9, s. 3</A>.</P>
 
<a name="sec74.7subsec3" id="sec74_7subsec3"></A><P class="headnote">Same</P>
 
<P class="subsection"><SPAN class="canlii_subsection" section="74.7" subsection="3" alinea="null">(3)</SPAN> As soon as possible after a person becomes an assignment employee of a temporary help agency, the agency shall provide a copy of the most recent document published by the Director under this section to the employee.  <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="96780-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2009-c-9/latest/so-2009-c-9.html">2009, c. 9, s. 3</A>.</P>
 
<a name="sec74.7subsec4" id="sec74_7subsec4"></A><P class="headnote">Same</P>
 
<P class="subsection"><SPAN class="canlii_subsection" section="74.7" subsection="4" alinea="null">(4)</SPAN> If the language of an assignment employee is a language other than English, the temporary help agency shall make enquiries as to whether the Director has prepared a translation of the document into that language and, if the Director has done so, the agency shall also provide a copy of the translation to the employee.  <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="96780-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2009-c-9/latest/so-2009-c-9.html">2009, c. 9, s. 3</A>.</P>
 
<a name="sec74.7subsec5" id="sec74_7subsec5"></A><P class="headnote">Transition</P>
 
<P class="subsection"><SPAN class="canlii_subsection" section="74.7" subsection="5" alinea="null">(5)</SPAN> Where a person is an assignment employee of a temporary help agency on the day this section comes into force, the agency shall, as soon as possible after that day, provide the document required by subsection (3) and, where applicable, by subsection (4), to the employee.  <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="96780-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2009-c-9/latest/so-2009-c-9.html">2009, c. 9, s. 3</A>.</P>
 

 
<P class="headnote">Prohibitions</P>
 
<div class="paragWrapper" data-lbh-p-number="74.8" data-lbh-p-anchor="sec74.8" data-lbh-p-noteup-link="/en/#search/origin1=/en/on/laws/stat/so-2000-c-41/latest/so-2000-c-41.html&linkedNoteup=&section1=74.8"><div class="bootstrap unselectable viibes-marker-toolbox lbh-p-tools" data-with-parag="74.8" title="Paragraph tools"><div class="dropdown dropleft"><i data-toggle="dropdown" class="fa-thin fa-message-pen" data-noteup-count="3" data-noteup-count-display="3"></i><div class="dropdown-menu lbh-p-tools-menu"></div></div></div><P class="section" data-viibes-parag="74.8" data-viibes-start="144" data-viibes-end="143"><A name="BK181"></A><B><a name="sec74.8subsec1" id="sec74_8subsec1"></A><a name="sec74.8" id="sec74_8"></A>74.8 </B><SPAN class="canlii_section_with_subsection" section="74.8" subsection="1" alinea="null">(1)</SPAN> A temporary help agency is prohibited from doing any of the following:</P></div>
 
<P class="paragraph">  1.  Charging a fee to an assignment employee in connection with him or her becoming an assignment employee of the agency.</P>
 
<P class="paragraph">  2.  Charging a fee to an assignment employee in connection with the agency assigning or attempting to assign him or her to perform work on a temporary basis for clients or potential clients of the agency.</P>
 
<P class="paragraph">  3.  Charging a fee to an assignment employee of the agency in connection with assisting or instructing him or her on preparing resumes or preparing for job interviews.</P>
 
<P class="paragraph">  4.  Restricting an assignment employee of the agency from entering into an employment relationship with a client.</P>
 
<P class="paragraph">  5.  Charging a fee to an assignment employee of the agency in connection with a client of the agency entering into an employment relationship with him or her.</P>
 
<P class="paragraph">  6.  Restricting a client from providing references in respect of an assignment employee of the agency.</P>
 
<P class="paragraph">  7.  Restricting a client from entering into an employment relationship with an assignment employee.</P>
 
<P class="paragraph">  8.  Charging a fee to a client in connection with the client entering into an employment relationship with an assignment employee, except as permitted by subsection (2).</P>
 
<P class="paragraph">  9.  Charging a fee that is prescribed as prohibited.</P>
 
<P class="paragraph">  10.  Imposing a restriction that is prescribed as prohibited.  <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="96780-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2009-c-9/latest/so-2009-c-9.html">2009, c. 9, s. 3</A>.</P>
 
<a name="sec74.8subsec2" id="sec74_8subsec2"></A><P class="headnote">Exception, par. 8 of subs. (1) </P>
 
<P class="subsection"><SPAN class="canlii_subsection" section="74.8" subsection="2" alinea="null">(2)</SPAN> Where an assignment employee has been assigned by a temporary help agency to perform work on a temporary basis for a client and the employee has begun to perform the work, the agency may charge a fee to the client in the event that the client enters into an employment relationship with the employee, but only during the six-month period beginning on the day on which the employee first began to perform work for the client of the agency.  <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="96780-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2009-c-9/latest/so-2009-c-9.html">2009, c. 9, s. 3</A>.</P>
 
<a name="sec74.8subsec3" id="sec74_8subsec3"></A><P class="headnote">Same</P>
 
<P class="subsection"><SPAN class="canlii_subsection" section="74.8" subsection="3" alinea="null">(3)</SPAN> For the purposes of subsection (2), the six-month period runs regardless of the duration of the assignment or assignments by the agency of the assignment employee to work for the client and regardless of the amount or timing of work performed by the assignment employee.  <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="96780-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2009-c-9/latest/so-2009-c-9.html">2009, c. 9, s. 3</A>.</P>
 
<a name="sec74.8subsec3.1" id="sec74_8subsec3_1"></A><P class="headnote">Same</P>
 
<P class="subsection"><SPAN class="canlii_subsection" section="74.8" subsection="3.1" alinea="null">(3.1)</SPAN> Subsection (2) does not apply if the Director,</P>
 
<P class="paragraph">  (a)  refuses to issue or renew a licence under <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="74.1.5" href="#sec74.1.5_smooth">section 74.1.5</A> and the client enters into an employment relationship with the employee after the refusal;</P>
 
<P class="paragraph">  (b)  revokes the licence to operate the temporary help agency under <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="74.1.6" href="#sec74.1.6_smooth">section 74.1.6</A> and the client enters into an employment relationship with the assignment employee after the revocation;</P>
 
<P class="paragraph">  (c)  suspends the licence to operate the temporary help agency under <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="74.1.6" href="#sec74.1.6_smooth">section 74.1.6</A> and the client enters into an employment relationship with the assignment employee while the licence is suspended; or</P>
 
<P class="paragraph">  (d)  cancels the licence under <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="74.1.11" href="#sec74.1.11_smooth">section 74.1.11</A> and the client enters into an employment relationship with the assignment employee after the cancellation. <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="97113-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2021-c-35/latest/so-2021-c-35.html">2021, c. 35</A>, Sched. 2, <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="15" href="#sec15_smooth">s. 15</A>.</P>
 
<a name="sec74.8subsec4" id="sec74_8subsec4"></A><P class="headnote">Interpretation</P>
 
<P class="subsection"><SPAN class="canlii_subsection" section="74.8" subsection="4" alinea="null">(4)</SPAN> In this section, “assignment employee” includes a prospective assignment employee.  <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="96780-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2009-c-9/latest/so-2009-c-9.html">2009, c. 9, s. 3</A>.</P>
 

 
<P class="headnote">Void provisions</P>
 
<div class="paragWrapper" data-lbh-p-number="74.9" data-lbh-p-anchor="sec74.9" data-lbh-p-noteup-link="/en/#search/origin1=/en/on/laws/stat/so-2000-c-41/latest/so-2000-c-41.html&linkedNoteup=&section1=74.9"><div class="bootstrap unselectable viibes-marker-toolbox lbh-p-tools" data-with-parag="74.9" title="Paragraph tools"><div class="dropdown dropleft"><i data-toggle="dropdown" class="fa-thin fa-message-pen" data-noteup-count="1" data-noteup-count-display="1"></i><div class="dropdown-menu lbh-p-tools-menu"></div></div></div><P class="section" data-viibes-parag="74.9" data-viibes-start="145" data-viibes-end="144"><A name="BK182"></A><B><a name="sec74.9subsec1" id="sec74_9subsec1"></A><a name="sec74.9" id="sec74_9"></A>74.9 </B><SPAN class="canlii_section_with_subsection" section="74.9" subsection="1" alinea="null">(1)</SPAN> A provision in an agreement between a temporary help agency and an assignment employee of the agency that is inconsistent with <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="74.8" href="#sec74.8_smooth">section 74.8</A> is void.  <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="96780-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2009-c-9/latest/so-2009-c-9.html">2009, c. 9, s. 3</A>.</P></div>
 
<a name="sec74.9subsec2" id="sec74_9subsec2"></A><P class="headnote">Same</P>
 
<P class="subsection"><SPAN class="canlii_subsection" section="74.9" subsection="2" alinea="null">(2)</SPAN> A provision in an agreement between a temporary help agency and a client that is inconsistent with <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="74.8" href="#sec74.8_smooth">section 74.8</A> is void.  <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="96780-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2009-c-9/latest/so-2009-c-9.html">2009, c. 9, s. 3</A>.</P>
 
<a name="sec74.9subsec3" id="sec74_9subsec3"></A><P class="headnote">Transition</P>
 
<P class="subsection"><SPAN class="canlii_subsection" section="74.9" subsection="3" alinea="null">(3)</SPAN> Subsections (1) and (2) apply to provisions regardless of whether the agreement was entered into before or after the date on which <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="74.8" href="#sec74.8_smooth">section 74.8</A> comes into force.  <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="96780-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2009-c-9/latest/so-2009-c-9.html">2009, c. 9, s. 3</A>.</P>
 
<a name="sec74.9subsec4" id="sec74_9subsec4"></A><P class="headnote">Interpretation</P>
 
<P class="subsection"><SPAN class="canlii_subsection" section="74.9" subsection="4" alinea="null">(4)</SPAN> In this section, “assignment employee” includes a prospective assignment employee.  <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="96780-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2009-c-9/latest/so-2009-c-9.html">2009, c. 9, s. 3</A>.</P>
 

 
<P class="headnote">Public holiday pay</P>
 
<div class="paragWrapper" data-lbh-p-number="74.10" data-lbh-p-anchor="sec74.10" data-lbh-p-noteup-link="/en/#search/origin1=/en/on/laws/stat/so-2000-c-41/latest/so-2000-c-41.html&linkedNoteup=&section1=74.10"><div class="bootstrap unselectable viibes-marker-toolbox lbh-p-tools" data-with-parag="74.10" title="Paragraph tools"><div class="dropdown dropleft"><i data-toggle="dropdown" class="fa-thin fa-pen-to-square"></i><div class="dropdown-menu lbh-p-tools-menu"></div></div></div><P class="section" data-viibes-parag="74.10" data-viibes-start="146" data-viibes-end="145"><A name="BK183"></A><B><a name="sec74.10subsec1" id="sec74_10subsec1"></A><a name="sec74.10" id="sec74_10"></A>74.10 </B><SPAN class="canlii_section_with_subsection" section="74.10" subsection="1" alinea="null">(1)</SPAN> For the purposes of determining entitlement to public holiday pay under <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="29" ss="2.1" href="#sec29subsec2.1_smooth">subsection 29 (2.1)</A>, an assignment employee of a temporary help agency is on a layoff on a public holiday if the public holiday falls on a day on which the employee is not assigned by the agency to perform work for a client of the agency.  <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="96780-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2009-c-9/latest/so-2009-c-9.html">2009, c. 9, s. 3</A>.</P></div>
 
<a name="sec74.10subsec2" id="sec74_10subsec2"></A><P class="headnote">Same</P>
 
<P class="subsection"><SPAN class="canlii_subsection" section="74.10" subsection="2" alinea="null">(2)</SPAN> For the purposes of <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="29" ss="2.2" href="#sec29subsec2.2_smooth">subsection 29 (2.2)</A>, the period of a temporary lay-off of an assignment employee by a temporary help agency shall be determined in accordance with <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="56" href="#sec56_smooth">section 56</A> as modified by <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="713-current-1" s="74.11" href="#sec74.11_smooth">section 74.11</A> for the purposes of Part XV.  <A class="reflex2-link" concatenated-id="96780-current-1" href="/en/on/laws/astat/so-2009-c-9/latest/so-2009-c-9.html">2009, c. 9, s. 3</A>.</P>
 

 
<P class="headnote">Termination of assignment</P>
 
<div class="paragWrapper" data-lbh-p-number="74.10.1" data-lbh-p-anchor="sec74.10.1" data-lbh-p-noteup-link="/en/#search/origin1=/en/on/laws/stat/so-2000-c-41/latest/so-2000-c-41.html&linkedNoteup=&section1=74.10.1"><div class="bootstrap unselectable viibes-marker-toolbox lbh-p-tools" data-with-parag="74.10.1" title="Paragraph tools"><div class="dropdown dropleft"><i data-toggle="dropdown" class="fa-thin fa-pen-to-square"></i><div class="dropdown-menu lbh-p-tools-menu"></div></div></div><P class="section" data-viibes-parag="74.10.1" data-viibes-start="147" data-viibes-end="146"><A name="BK184"></A><B><a name="sec74.10.1subsec1" id="sec74_10_1subsec1"></A><a name="sec74.10.1" id="sec74_10_1"></A>74.10.1 </B><SPAN class="canlii_section_with_subsection" section="74.10.1" subsection="1" alinea="null">(1)</SPAN> A temporary help agency shall provide an assignment employee with one week’s written notice or pay in lieu of notice if,</P></div>
 
<P class="paragraph">  (a)  the assignment employee is assigned to perform work for a client;</P>
 
<P class="paragraph">  (b)  the assignment had an estimated term of three months or more at the time it was offered to the employee; and</P>
